item.title: Tip of the week
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

[quote=“kickingjamie, post:11, topic:436903”][quote author=Kidpaparoach link=topic=539617.msg3949706#msg3949706 date=1332192921]

It’d be faster to google what scrolls rather than posting asking and waiting for a reply http://runescape.wikia.com/wiki/Magpie = Thieving fingers scroll took 3 seconds roughly to find out o.o

Do you feel like an asshole now? It takes 10seconds to read and find out you dont even need a scroll to get the items…

No, you asked what scrolls it used… I said what scrolls the familiar uses, derp. I know it doesn’t need any, I’ve been aware of its ability I’ve just never used it. Why would I feel like an asshole? I actually wasted like a minute of my life saying something you should do, 3 seconds of your life or waste your time. Its up to you.
[/quote]
Parental controls restricts me from google I’m afraid…

Sorry haha, I have no decent reply and right now am fealing like a idiot because I have just realised I have posted something absoloutly retarded…[/quote]
Really o.o? Unlucky.
Oooh, no need to be sorry<3

Read full topic

[/quote]

I actually wasted like a minute of my life saying something you should do, 3 seconds of your life or waste your time. Its up to you.[/quote]
Parental controls restricts me from google I’m afraid…

Sorry haha, I have no decent reply and right now am fealing like a idiot because I have just realised I have posted something absoloutly retarded…
